post:
[FreeCpanelSharedHosting.com ](https://my.FreeCpanelSharedHosting.com) is the Shared Hosting child of Lowendspirit.com and operated with the help of its community.   

FCSH has now been operating since 2014 and are ready to offer the Lowendtalk community proper hosting!
FCSH offers cPanel hosting in Miami, Florida and VestaCP hosting in Rotterdam, NL.

The latest addition is Hosted Piwik with the first location available in Milan, Italy and more recently added location in Atlanta, Georgia.

The cPanel packages include Softaculous among many other features and offerings. Need more? Open a ticket and we could probably work out a custom plan that fits your needs.

We are ready to take your order! Try us out; you have nothing to lose!

**_The discounts_**

Try the new hosted Piwik with a 50% discount for life! ( CODE:  7OOVHK74TY)  
Atlanta: [Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=17&promocode=7OOVHK74TY)
Milan: [Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=14&promocode=7OOVHK74TY)

If you want to see all packages: (no promo on the smaller ones)  
[Atlanta](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?gid=6) | [Milan](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?gid=6)  


Some Screenshots of the WHMCS Integration: 
http://imgur.com/a/ZYM3L


You will of course get full report access to Piwik.


Hosting Packages:

**_cPanel_**    

_Feline_ ($3/year)  
Disk: 1 GB  
Bandwidth: 10 GB /month  
2 MySQL databases  
Softaculous  
[Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)

_Canis_ ($5/year)  
Disk: 2 GB  
Bandwidth: 20 GB /month  
3 MySQL databases  
Softaculous  
[Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3)  

**_VestaCP_**  
_Small Package_ ($3/year)  
Disk: 3 GB   
Bandwidth: 30 GB / month   
3 mySQL database  
999 Email accounts / domain  
1 domain  
[Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=7)

  
_Medium Package_ ($5/year)  
Disk: 5 GB   
Bandwidth: 50 GB / month   
5 mySQL database  
999 Email accounts / domain  
100 web domains  
100 mail domains  
100 DNS domains  
[Order Link](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=8)  

Thank you for reading!
please also note that there is added stock to the Free Hosting package.
